text: Myles Pillage (born 24 January 1998) is a British modern pentathlete. He participated at the 2018 World Modern Pentathlon Championships, winning a medal.Team results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:British male modern pentathletes Category:World Modern Pentathlon Championships medalists Category:Sportspeople from Plymouth
title: Myles Pillage
